QuestData.Title: Icy Webs
QuestData.Description:
Many of my friends and colleagues were captured when the arachnids and their Primalist masters attacked.
I saw them being bound in frozen webbing and dragged away to a fate I dare not consider.
Please free any of them that you can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Cocooned Survivors in Shiverweb Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I feared I would never see any of them again.
